ygData.subject: Re: SK's and mana at 9th
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congrats on your level and good weekend.  Always nice to have good days, because with an SK you ll have plenty of bad. ... This is one of the nice things
ygData.messageBody:
rich.hitz@... wrote:
>

Congrats on your level and good weekend. Always nice to have good
days, because with an SK you'll have plenty of bad.

> New Thread
> I was in Neriak when I hit 9th, and the DE guild would
> not train me cause I play a troll. grrr. I went back to
> Grobb and trained my magic abilities and my 1H Slash to
> keep it up a bit. Then I bought all the 1st Rank
> spells. All righty then! kewl. I zone to the swamp and
> cast my first pet. NOT!!!!
> "Insufficiant mana to cast this spell." WTF!!! Try
> again. Same thing. Mana cost: 40. Hmmm. Dam. No big
> deal really. Me not use one before. Is ok.
> Next spell.
> Invis to Undead. "Insufficiant mana to cast this spell."
> Crap! Mana cost: 40.
> Great. The spell that makes a SK visible as a SK (pet) I
> am too stupid (Int of 62) to cast! And the spell that
> will keep annoying green skele from attacking me I can't
> cast either.

This is one of the nice things about the DE SK's. I had no
prob summoning my pet at level 9 unless I fizzled (that was
before they turned down fizzle mana). You'll be able to at
level 10. My INT was the default DE (I think), 109. I
through down spells like crazy, basically darknessing every
opponent I fight (funny when they start to run and just turn
around). Can't wait for level 30: Heat Blood, Invis, and
Feign Death!

As to +INT items, at your level you'd be better off with +mana
items, but the time will come when that will change. I have
a silver sapphire necklace right now (4 STR / 4 INT) A great
necklace for SK's, but it'll cost you 150-250pp depending on
teh jeweler.

Xilith T'Vyn
27th SK on Tunare
